BRIDGE.name: Bridge of the Enterprise
BRIDGE.desc: You are standing on the bridge of the Enterprise. Lt. Commander Data is at Ops, and Wesley has the helm. Mr. Worf is barking something about Romulans, blah, blah, blah.

READYROOM.name: Captain's Ready Room
READYROOM.desc: You are in the captain's ready room. Captain Picard is seated behind his desk, sipping an Earl Grat tea, hot.

items.desc: A type 1 phaser is on the captains desk
items.take: You take the phaser while the captain isn't looking and slip into your pocket.. Oh, wait, your uniform doesn't have pockets.
